result.name: Genetic Impact of Chronic Inflammation On Colon Mucosa Cells through Whole Exome Sequencing
result.description: To investigate whether chronic inflammation contribute to colon carcinogenesis development by somatic mutation accumulation, chronic colitis mouse model was established and then colon mucosa and muscularis mucosae tissue were separated for whole exome sequencing
result.center: The First Peoples Hospital of Foshan,China
